channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Many Buyers are on the Sidelines?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! The Nasdaq just hit fresh highs—but there’s still $7.4 trillion sitting in money market funds. That’s a massive amount of fuel for thi...

item.title: The Laggards to Leaders Opportunity
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I just dug into the Russell 1000’s performance and spotted something interesting—July’s leaders have been the first half’s laggards. M...

item.title: The True Market Outperformers
item.description: Hey, Ross here! Everyone’s watching the large-cap stocks charge higher—but they’re missing what’s happening beneath the surface. As I break down in to...

item.title: Bullish Breadth
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I’ve been tracking a key breadth scorecard that covers everything from small caps to large caps—and the signals are looking solid. Mos...

item.title: Market Rotation Underway?
item.description: Hey, Ross here! I’ve been watching a key chart: the QQQ/DJI ratio. It tracks how much the Nasdaq 100 is outperforming the Dow—and right now, it’s fall...
